content: malabrigo head thingie slipped stitches add dimension to this soft and comfy hat a great match with the malabrigo hand thingies the best part one skein of malabrigo worsted makes the hat and the gloves yarn 1 skein malabrigo kettle dyed pure merino worsted wool 3 5 oz/216 yds color of your choice color used autumn forest needles 16 circular needle size 5 us 3 75mm and sz 9 us 5 5mm set of 4 size 9 us 5 5mm dpn s notions stitch marker blunt end needle gauge 4 5 stitches = 1 in pattern stitch pattern st round 1 knit 3 slip 1 round 2 knit around note allways slip stitches purlwise cast on 92 sts on size 5 circulars using long tail method place st marker and join being careful not to twist stitches round 1-4 k1 p1 change to size 9 circulars and knit rounds 1 & 2 of pattern stitch for appx 7 or 20 times 40 rnds total decrease rnds round 1 *k1 k2tog sl1 repeat from * around 69 sts round 2 knit around round 3 *k2tog sl 1 repeat from * around 46 sts round 4 knit around round 5 k2tog around 23 sts round 6 knit around round 7 k2tog to last st k1 round 8 knit around cut yarn leaving about 8-10 of length run yarn through remaining loops on needles pull tightly and secure weave in ends contact nanoeffects@gmail com blog http //a-nano-knittomy blogspot com/ and http //nanoeffects blogspot com/ this pattern is free for unlimited personal use you may bookmark it print it copy and paste it you can even make paper airplanes from your printed copy if you like just let people who are interested know where you got it
